purpose: Illustrate capabilities that enhance interactions between the public and private sector
title: Certain capabilities may benefit interactions between the public and private sector
reasoning_strategy: List and align capabilities with corresponding steps
layout: horizontal flow with icons and descriptions

visual_elements.label: Fast track procurement with innovative models

cells: Ability to analyze and identify investable opportunities that support economic development and addresses public sector needs
Ability to prioritize projects that meet investment needs
Ability to determine if investments are feasible and appropriate for the investor
Ability to engage with public sector entities (e.g., DOTs, elected officials) to build support for the project and the value private investment would bring

rows.row_label: Fast track procurement with innovative models
cells: Ability to develop innovative engagement models and pursue a fast-tracked procurement model
Ability to deliver against designed commitments and meet established milestones
